text: No person other than a registered physician shall treat any case of inflammation of the eyes, attended by a discharge therefrom, of a newborn child for any period longer than may be necessary to obtain the services of a registered physician.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Treatment by other than registered physician.
